headline: Newmont (NEM) Valuation in Focus as Gold Rally and Analyst Upgrades Drive Market Cap to Record Highs
summary: Newmont, the world’s largest gold producer, has seen its stock price and market value climb to multi-year highs following a powerful rally in gold prices and a wave of investor optimism. Ongoing trade tensions and steady operational performance have also contributed to the momentum. See our latest analysis for Newmont. This wave of optimism comes after several major moves by Newmont, including streamlining its global operations following the acquisition of Newcrest, launching a new $3 billion...
